name: OBLIGATE ANAEROBE UT ALTIUS
description:
You can move your obligate anaerobe (an organism, that does not like oxygen) left and right.

Get deeper, away from the oxygen in the upper areas.

Eat iron to get deeper and avoid hydrogen peroxide, which pulls you up.

Created for Ludum Dare 48 ("Deeper and Deeper"). Using Unity without any external or pre-prepared assets and NI Monark and NI Kinetic Metal for audio. Game design and all code, graphics and audio created from scratch during game jam by Rafael- Rafael spent a total of 28 hours creating the game.

v1.0 as submitted for Ludum Dare 48
